description: React component for the restaurant detail page in a food delivery frontend. Includes functions for grouping menu items, rendering menu items, managing cart interactions, and displaying restaurant details with menu and cart summary.

methods.name: groupMenuByCategory
methods.description: Groups menu items into categories based on their names, such as 'Seafood' or 'Grill & BBQ'.

methods.name: MenuItemCard
methods.description: Component for rendering individual menu items with an image, name, description, price, and add-to-cart button.

methods.name: AddToCartBar
methods.description: Sticky footer bar showing current cart subtotal, item count, and button to view cart.

methods.name: RestaurantDetailClient
methods.description: Main React functional component for the restaurant detail page, managing data fetching, state, and rendering restaurant info, menu, and cart summary.
